name: Undergraduate Research
long_desc: Students may investigate research problems under the supervision of members of the faculty. Permission of a faculty advisor required. Students MUST complete the application form in order to participate  register. Students MUST review the requirements and deadlines in full located at httpswww.cmu.edubioresearchugrrfc.html prior to applying. The application link will be published on the website on the first day of class each semester. Forms must be received by the posted deadline.

custom_fields.relevance: Supervised undergraduate research for academic credit with a Biology faculty member.
custom_fields.learning_resources: per Advisor; Additionally the Biological Sciences Office requires 1.5-2 page summary as outlined in the Research for Credit form that is updated each semester
custom_fields.extra_time_commitment: 1 unit = 1 hour of research/week during the academic year
